articles.description: As per the former all-rounder, impact player rule has made the domestic T20 league tighter. He also went on to say that the impact player rule has made a big difference and it’s critics will eventually have to look at it again.
articles.content:
Amid criticism from several fans and experts, former India head coach Ravi Shastri has backed the controversial impact player rule in the Indian Premier League (IPL).
